amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 116-289 to include community colleges in recruitment efforts to diversify the United States Export Finance Agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 116-289 to include community colleges in recruitment efforts to diversify the United States Export Finance Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
